                 java.util.Collection<Move> legalMoves,
                 java.util.Collection<Move> opponentLegalMoves)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        board - The current state of the board
        legalMoves - Most legal moves the player can make (excluding en passant, castle,...)
        opponentLegalMoves - Most legal moves the opponent can make (excluding en passant, castle,...)
